column4: which video player plugin do you guys use for firefox? The mplayer plugin, which is a nice one by the way, sucks all the time on HD vids... :(
i use the totem plugin, it works fine except with wacky codecs, but then i just open up the embedded video in vlc
Panarchy: Ok I now try the mediaplayerconnectivity plugin. that lets you choose which player you want to use to play a video
